movies.title: O Menino da Porteira
movies.plot: 1950s. At the village of Rio Bonito, cowboy Diogo leads a horde of oxen to the Ouro Fino Ranch. When passing by the Remanso Farm, he meets Rodrigo, a boy who dreams of becoming a cowboy. Soon they become friends and witnesses of the wrong doings that happen in the region due to Major Batista's greed. The major orders his thugs to blackmail the local residents, in a way they sell the cattle by the price he wants. The situation changes when Otacílio Mendes, Rodrigo's father, decide to rebel himself, counting on Dr. Almeida's help.
movies.simplePlot: 1950s. At the village of Rio Bonito, cowboy Diogo leads a horde of oxen to the Ouro Fino Ranch. When passing by the Remanso Farm, he meets Rodrigo, a boy who dreams of becoming a cowboy. ...

biography.bio: Daniel was born on September 9, 1968 in Brotas, São Paulo, Brazil as José Daniel Camillo. He is an actor, known for Paradise City (2009), O Menino da Porteira (2009) and Xuxa Requebra (1999).
biography.name: Daniel

biography.placeOfBirth: Volta Redonda, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil
biography.bio: Vanessa Giacomo is one of the most talented and famous Brazilian film and television actress. Giacomo made her television debut in the soap opera "Cabocla" in 2004 at the age of 20, where she met and fell in love with the actor Daniel de Oliveira. They started dating after the soap ended. They have been married since 2007. She gave birth to their first son Raul on January 21st 2008 and two years later on May 29th they gave Raul a little brother, Moses. Giacomo won the Most Promising Actress award at the 2005 "Premio Contigo Brazil", for Cabocla (2004). She has done many soap operas after "Cabocla" and all of them were for Globo TV, currently the largest commercial television network of Latin America and the third largest in the world. In the movie business, Giacomo was nominated for the Best Actress award at the 2006 "Premio Contigo de Cinema" for her first movie "Canta Maria". Besides "Canta Maria" she has done other movies, the most prominent ones are "O Menino da Porteira", with the famous Brazilian country singer Daniel and "Jean Charles", a true story of a Brazilian worker whom was mistaken for a terrorist and shot dead by police in London in 2005, filming took place in London during 2008. And soon she will be on Movie Theaters on "Prime Time Soap" where she interprets a prostitute who is a soap operas fanatic fan, living a fiction life.
biography.name: Vanessa Giácomo

biography.placeOfBirth: Santa Rita do Passa Quatro, São Paulo, Brazil
biography.bio: José de Abreu was born on May 24, 1946 in Santa Rita do Passa Quatro, São Paulo, Brazil as José Pereira de Abreu Júnior. He is an actor and director, known for Brazil Avenue (2012), Forbidden Desire (2007) and Her Own Destiny (2004).
biography.name: José de Abreu

biography.bio: João Pedro Carvalho is an actor, known for Uma Rosa com Amor (2010), O Menino da Porteira (2009) and Brazil Avenue (2012).
biography.name: João Pedro Carvalho

biography.bio: Rosi Campos was born on March 30, 1954 in Bragança Paulista, São Paulo, Brazil as Rosângela Martins Campos. She is an actress, known for Au coeur du péché (2004), The Prophet (2006) and Cat's Cradle (2009).
biography.name: Rosi Campos

biography.bio: Eucir de Souza was born on May 24, 1970 in Guaxupé, Minas Gerais, Brazil. He is an actor, known for Au premier regard (2014), Palindrome (2001) and Meu Mundo em Perigo (2007).
biography.name: Eucir de Souza

biography.bio: Antônio Edson is an actor, known for Smoke Gets in Your Eyes (2009), Today Is Maria's Day (2005) and Muro (2008).
biography.name: Antônio Edson

biography.bio: Valter Santos was an actor, known for O Menino da Porteira (2009), ABCs of Death 2 (2014) and Mulheres do Cais (1979). He died on December 24, 2013 in Brazil.
biography.name: Valter Santos

biography.bio: Eduardo Chagas is an actor, known for Embodiment of Evil (2008), Smoke Gets in Your Eyes (2009) and O Menino da Porteira (2009).
biography.name: Eduardo Chagas

biography.bio: Lui Strassburger was born as Luis Emilio Strassburguer. He is an actor, known for Átimo (1997), Brainstorm (2000) and O Menino da Porteira (2009).
biography.name: Lui Strassburger

biography.bio: Cláudia Missura is an actress, known for Brazil Avenue (2012), Domésticas (2001) and Tempos Modernos (2010).
biography.name: Cláudia Missura

biography.bio: Zedu Neves is an actor, known for Caixa Dois (2007), O Menino da Porteira (2009) and Uma Rosa com Amor (2010).
biography.name: Zedu Neves

biography.bio: Carlos Meceni is an actor, known for Friendly Fire (1998), Bellini and the Sphynx (2002) and Amanhã Nunca Mais (2011).
biography.name: Carlos Meceni
